sections.title: Origins (2018): Wapka & FriendsClub
sections.body: I first discovered the magic of building for the web through Wapka. Inspired, I created FriendsClub—a small social platform where people could post, chat, and connect. When Wapka shut down, I doubled down on learning to build it all myself. PHP was my starting point, then JavaScript to rebuild FriendsClub from scratch.

bullets.text: Explored Python & C for competitive programming and problem solving
Built an Android WebView app for FriendsClub
Learned full-stack: Core PHP, Laravel, Node.js, Express, Python (FastAPI, Django), and Java
Adopted Linux & Bash for server management and automation
